ARABIC: أَمْ لَمْ يَعْرِفُوا۟ رَسُولَهُمْ فَهُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Or is it that they do not recognise their Messenger and therefore do not acknowledge him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or did they not recognise their apostle, and rejected him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Or is it that they were unaware of their Messenger and were therefore repelled by him for he was a stranger to them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Or did you not recognize your Messenger and, thus, denied him (Muhammad)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Or is it that they did not recognise their Noble Messenger, therefore they consider him alien?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or is it that they did not recognize their Messenger so they deny him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or is it that they have not recognized their Apostle, so that they deny him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Or did they not recognise their Messenger and so denied him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or know they not their messenger, and so reject him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Or do they not recognize their Messenger, and so deny him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or, is it that they recognised not their apostle, and so of him they become deniers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is it that they do not recognize their apostle, and so they deny him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or do they not recognise their Messenger, that they deny him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or is it that they did not recognize their Messenger (Muhammad SAW) so they deny him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Or, is it because they do not recognize their Messenger that they denied him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or is it that they did not recognize their messenger, so they are denying him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:69] Or is it that they do not recognise their [own] Messenger and so they reject him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Or know they not their messenger) the lineage of their Messenger, (and so reject him) and so deny him?
